tags.name: place-toasts
tags.description:
Toast notifications implementation inspired by `@see`.
Attributes are not dynamic (evaluated when connected)!

Attributes:

  * `ui` {"default"|"default-wrapper"|"custom"} - To apply all default styles, or only for `<place-toasts>` itself, or no and use custom (via CSS).

  * `color-scheme` {COLORSCHEME} - Prefered mode dark/ligh or detect from system (default). Make sence to use with `ui`≠'custom'.

Properties:

  * `ui` {"default"|"default-wrapper"|"custom"} - To apply all default styles, or only for `<place-toasts>` itself, or no and use custom (via CSS).

  * `colorScheme` {`"dark" | "light" | "auto"`} -

attributes.name: ui
attributes.description:
`ui` {"default"|"default-wrapper"|"custom"} - To apply all default styles, or only for `<place-toasts>` itself, or no and use custom (via CSS).

Property: ui

Default: default

attributes.name: color-scheme
attributes.description:
`color-scheme` {COLORSCHEME} - Prefered mode dark/ligh or detect from system (default). Make sence to use with `ui`≠'custom'.

Default: auto
